Name: neuroacanthocytosis
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease that is characterized by acanthocytosis

Name: familial encephalopathy with neuroserpin inclusion bodies
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease that is characterized by intraneuronal inclusions of mutant neuroserpin resulting in progressive encephalopathy

Name: infantile cerebellar-retinal degeneration
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease that is characterized by onset between ages 2 and 6 months of truncal hypotonia
Synonym: inclusion body myopathy with Paget's disease of bone and frontotemporal dementia

Name: synucleinopathy
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease that is characterized by the abnormal accumulation of aggregates of alpha-synuclein protein in neurons

Name: hereditary ataxia
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease that is characterized by slowly progressive incoordination of gait and often associated with poor coordination of hands

Name: pontocerebellar hypoplasia
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease that is characterized by underdevelopment of the pons and cerebellum.

Name: SPOAN syndrome
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease characterized by spastic paraplegia

Name: agenesis of the corpus callosum with peripheral neuropathy
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance with early onset of severe sensory-motor polyneuropathy

Name: Huntington's disease-like 2
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease characterized by involuntary movements and abnormalities of voluntary movements

Name: neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease characterized by progressive iron accumulation in the basal ganglia and other regions of the brain

Name: amyotrophic lateral sclerosis-parkinsonism/dementia complex 1
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease characterized by chronic

Name: Pick's disease
Definition: A leprosy that is an early form of the disease which causes one to a few hypopigmented or erythematous macules.

Name: myoclonic cerebellar dyssynergia
Definition: An acquired metabolic disease that has_material_basis_in the presence of abnormally-high levels of prolactin in the blood.

Name: Huntington's disease
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease that has_material_basis_in autosomal dominant inheritance and is characterized by unwanted choreatic movements

Name: secondary Parkinson disease
Definition: A parathyroid gland disease characterized by an overactivity of the parathyroid glands

Name: olivopontocerebellar atrophy
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease that is characterized by progressive cerebellar ataxia

Name: obsolete Fryns syndrome
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease that is characterized by progressive cerebellar ataxia

Name: motor neuron disease
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease that is located_in the motor neurones.

Name: demyelinating disease
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease that is characterized by damage to the myelin sheath present around nerve axons.

Name: obsolete infectious bovine rhinotracheitis
Definition: A Varicellovirus infectious disease that results_in infection in cattle

Name: plexopathy
Definition: A mitochondrial encephalomyopathy that is characterized by mitochondrial myopathy

Name: tauopathy
Definition: A neurodegenerative disease that has_material_basis_in the pathological aggregation of tau protein in so-called neurofibrillary tangles (NFT) in the human brain.
Synonym: mixed Yolk Sac tumor and teratoma with Seminoma of testis

Name: obsolete recurrent hematologic cancer
Definition: A hematoloic cancer that is located_in the blood or bone marrow that has come back in a patient.

Name: obsolete relapsed precursor T lymphoblastic lymphoma-leukemia
Definition: A hematoloic cancer that is located_in the blood or bone marrow that has come back in a patient.

Name: obsolete recurrent adult acute lymphocytic leukemia
Definition: A recurrent hematologic cancer that is located_in bone marrow and is characterized by the production of too many lymphocytes.

Name: primary cerebellar degeneration
Definition: An amino acid metabolic disorder that involves impaired break down of the amino acid tyrosine.
